string-array.name: myQuotes
string-array.item: “Believe only half of what you see and nothing that you hear.” ― Edgar Allan Poe
“From even the greatest of horrors irony is seldom absent.” ― H.P. Lovecraft, Tales of H.P. Lovecraft
“The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed.” ― Stephen King, The Gunslinger
“We make up horrors to help us cope with the real ones.” ― Stephen King
